alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 8:30AM EDT until July 23 at 9:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Allen County in northeastern Indiana... Northern Huntington County in northeastern Indiana... Northeastern Wells County in northeastern Indiana... Northern Adams County in northeastern Indiana... Southwestern Defiance County in northwestern Ohio... Paulding County in west central Ohio... Northwestern Van Wert County in west central Ohio... * Until 915 AM EDT. * At 829 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Butler to near New Haven to near Markle, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, Huntington, Defiance, New Haven, Van Wert, Decatur, Ossian, Paulding, Antwerp, Woodburn, Monroeville, Payne, Convoy, Grabill, Aboite, Leo-cedarville, Middletown, Roanoke, Middlebury and Preble. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 0 and 30. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 288 and 321. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
